BR.name: Corpse Party
BR.description: Mayu Suzumoto está transferindo para uma nova escola secundária, deixando seus amigos e memórias. Para ajudá-la a lidar com este movimento, seu amigo Ayumi elaborou um plano: todo o grupo se unirão para realizar um ritual que ela encontrou na internet chamado "Sachiko Ever After", que é suposto para ligar todos os seus participantes juntos como amigos até o fim. Isso não saem como o esperado. Na sequência de um sismo intenso, o grupo desperta para encontrar-se separado e preso em uma versão de realidade alternativa de "Heavenly Host Elementary School," uma instituição atingidas pela tragédia que ficava no site da sua própria escola, mas foi demolido há muito tempo. Aqui, os espíritos vingativos de crianças pequenas ameaçam suas vidas e sua sanidade, e a única esperança de sobrevivência - e muito menos de fuga - é descobrir os detalhes de refrigeração que cercam o assassinato de pessoas presas antes deles.

CA.name: Corpse Party
CA.description: Kisaragi Academy student Mayu Suzumoto is transferring to a new high school, leaving behind a sizable group of friends and countless lovely memories. To help her cope with this move, her friend Ayumi has devised a seemingly innocent plan: the whole group will come together to perform a charm she found on the internet called “Sachiko Ever After,” which is supposed to bind all of its participants together as friends to the end. This does not go as expected. Following an intense earthquake, the group awakens to find themselves separated and trapped in an alternate reality version of Heavenly Host Elementary School, a tragedy-stricken institution that once stood on the site of their own school but was torn down long ago. Here, the vengeful spirits of elementary-aged children threaten their lives and their sanity, and the only hope of survival - much less escape - is to uncover the chilling details surrounding the murders of those trapped before them.

MX.name: Corpse Party
MX.description: Mayu Suzumoto está transfiriendo a una nueva escuela secundaria, dejando a sus amigos y recuerdos. Para ayudar a hacer frente a este movimiento, su amiga Ayumi ha ideado un plan: el grupo entero se reunirán para realizar un ritual que encontró en internet llamado "Sachiko siempre", que se supone que se unen todos sus participantes juntos como amigos hasta el final. Esto no produce los resultados esperados. Tras un intenso terremoto, el grupo se despierta para encontrarse a sí mismos separados y atrapado en una versión alternativa de la realidad "Heavenly Host Escuela Primaria," una institución tragedia del pánico que una vez estuvo en el sitio de su propia escuela, pero fue derribada hace mucho tiempo. Aquí, los espíritus vengativos de los niños pequeños amenazan su vida y su cordura, y la única esperanza de supervivencia - mucho menos de escape - es descubrir los detalles escalofriantes que rodean los asesinatos de los que están atrapados ante ellos.

US.description: Kisaragi Academy student Mayu Suzumoto is transferring to a new high school, leaving behind a sizable group of friends and countless lovely memories. To help her cope with this move, her friend Ayumi has devised a seemingly innocent plan: the whole group will come together to perform a charm she found on the internet called “Sachiko Ever After,” which is supposed to bind all of its participants together as friends to the end. This does not go as expected. Following an intense earthquake, the group awakens to find themselves separated and trapped in an alternate reality version of Heavenly Host Elementary School, a tragedy-stricken institution that once stood on the site of their own school but was torn down long ago. Here, the vengeful spirits of elementary-aged children threaten their lives and their sanity, and the only hope of survival - much less escape - is to uncover the chilling details surrounding the murders of those trapped before them.
